column2: quae pervia caelī porta manēs et stella maris
column5: populō. ^ Kind mother of the Redeemer
column6: who remaineth the open gate of heaven and the star of the sea
column7: help the falling people who seek to rise.

column5: Gabriēlis ab ōre sūmēns illud avē
column6: peccātōrum miserēre. ^ Thou who hast born
column10: hearing the greeting from Gabriel’s lips
